mapper.select: SELECT file.filesize as filesize,user_file.vfname as vfname, user_file.vpath as vpath,user_file.id as id, user_file.uptime as uptime,file.filetype as filetype FROM (user_file LEFT JOIN users ON users.id=user_file.uid)LEFT JOIN file ON file.id=user_file.fid WHERE users.id = #{id};

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (id,filename,md5,create_time,realpath,filesize,filetype) VALUE ((SELECT MAX(id)+1 FROM file tm),#{file.filename},#{file.md5},#{file.create_time},#{file.realpath},#{file.filesize},#{file.filetype})
